title: Lay Summarisation Pipeline
desc: Built an advanced biomedical text summarization system using retrieval-assisted prompting techniques. Implemented comprehensive output formatting validation and developed a robust evaluation harness for macro metrics and style assessment. The pipeline generates human-readable summaries from complex scientific papers, making research accessible to broader audiences.

title: Detoxification LLM Dataflow
desc: Engineered a sophisticated data curation and toxicity reduction workflow for large language models. Designed filtering mechanisms for translation sentiment analysis and implemented detoxification stages with reproducible runs. The system ensures AI-generated content meets safety standards while maintaining quality and coherence.

title: Movie Review Corpus and UI
desc: Created a comprehensive movie review corpus with custom annotation schema and an intuitive exploration interface. Developed comparison frameworks for GPT-style annotations against human labels, providing insights into AI-human annotation alignment. The system supports large-scale sentiment analysis research.

title: BC Environment NLP Pipeline
desc: Developed a comprehensive NLP pipeline for processing scanned environmental PDFs at the Government of British Columbia. Implemented advanced document classification using regex patterns and BERT models, built duplicate detection with ROUGE and RapidFuzz algorithms, and integrated local LLM fallbacks with Ollama for robust processing capabilities. The system processes thousands of documents with 95%+ accuracy.

title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
desc: Built a real-time analytics dashboard using Power BI and SQL pipelines for tracking order flow and business metrics. Implemented automated data processing workflows and created interactive visualizations that provide actionable insights for business decision-making. The dashboard serves 100+ daily users.

title: Portfolio Optimization Engine
desc: Developed an automated portfolio analytics and research system with intelligent reporting capabilities. Created algorithms for risk assessment, performance tracking, and investment recommendation generation. The engine processes millions of data points to provide data-driven insights for portfolio management.
